method.name: getFilters
method.description: Gets a list of available filters.
method.returns: array of filters with label, uid, thumb, description and parameter list for each filter.

method.name: upload
method.description: Uploads an image to the Aviary server.

param.name: filename
param.description: The filename including extension, stored in the 'uploads' folder.

method.returns: array with url to the file.

method.name: renderOptions
method.description: Renders a filter options thumbnail grid and returns render parameters for each option.

param.name: backgroundcolor
param.description: Background color for transparent uploads. Format: Hex values for Red Green Blue Alpha. Example: 0xFFFFFFFF

param.name: format
param.description: Rendered file format - JPG/PNG.

param.name: quality
param.description: Rendered file quality for JPG files. Value from 1-100

param.name: scale
param.description: Scale of the image. Value 0.0-1.0.

param.name: filepath
param.description: The url retrieved using the upload method.

param.name: filterid
param.description: ID of the filter.

param.name: cols
param.description: The number of columns to render in thumbnail grid.

param.name: rows
param.description: The number of rows to render in thumbnail grid.

param.name: cellwidth
param.description: The width of each cell in thumbnail grid.

param.name: cellheight
param.description: The height of each cell in thumbnail grid

method.returns: array with url to thumbnail grid and render option parameters.

method.name: render
method.description: Renders image based on render parameters.

param.name: backgroundcolor
param.description: Background color for transparent uploads. Format: Hex values for Red Green Blue Alpha. Example: 0xFFFFFFFF

param.name: format
param.description: Rendered file format - JPG/PNG.

param.name: quality
param.description: Rendered file quality for JPG files. Value from 1-100

param.name: scale
param.description: Scale of the image. Value 0.0-1.0.

param.name: filepath
param.description: The url retrieved using AviaryFX->upload.

param.name: filterid
param.description: ID of the filter.

param.name: width
param.description: The width of the rendered image. 0 returns original width.

param.name: height
param.description: The height of the rendered image. 0 returns original height.

param.name: renderparameters
param.description: (Optional) Filter render parameters retrieved from AviaryFX->renderOptions

method.returns: array with URL to rendered image
